sources.title: Let's Celebrake (1938)
sources.description: Popeye and Bluto pick up Olive to celebrate New Year's Eve with them. Popeye brings along her granny out of sympathy. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/lets-celebrake-1938/

metadata.Plot: Bluto and Popeye pick up Olive to celebrate New Year's Eve with them; Popeye brings along her granny out of sympathy. The ballroom has a dance contest; Bluto dances with Olive, and Popeye with granny after feeding her some spinach.
metadata.Actors: Everett Clark, Jack Mercer, Mae Questel
